metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32078 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description: An Out-of-Bounds Read was discovered inarch/arm/mach-footbridge/personal-pci.c in the Linux kernel through 5.12.11because of the lack of a check for a value that shouldn't be negative,e.g., access to element -2 of an array, aka CID-298a58e165e4.

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
